text: Giuseppe Olivi (18 March 1769 – 24 August 1795) was an Italian naturalist. Olivi was born at Chioggia. He was the author of Zoologia Adriatica (1792). He died in Padua. ==References== Category:Italian zoologists Category:Italian scientists Category:People from Chioggia Category:1769 births Category:1795 deaths
title: Giuseppe Olivi
